modName: Farkas and Vilkas - Clean  and Painted
summary: Cleans the twin\'s faces but leaves their paint on. Optional full clean faces as well.
descriptionHtml:
As requested, my files of Farkas and Vilkas with clean skin and lips but with their face paint. I painted a few parts to better blend and clean the lips.

Added fully clean option for both boys. 
If you want to mix and match Farkas is 0001A692 and Vilkas is 0001A694

Extract to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

I use Dall\'s face and body textures (note that I removed the roughness from the two rough files for a smoother look)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=973

With the normal maps by Windsong (I went over them myself with a very light soft brush)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=139
author: Porcelyn
